moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of making the target flinch or leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.effect: Turns the field into Electric Terrain.

moves.name: Make Some Sparks!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack. Ensures that the user’s next attack will be a critical hit. When the field is Electric Terrain, raises the accuracy of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Wild Charge
moves.effect: The user also takes 20% of the damage it dealt to the target.

syncMove.name: Star Shock Thunder Fang
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is paralyzed.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 4
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Aggravation 4
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Terrify 1
passives.description: Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs when the Pokémon enters a battle.

grid.bonus: Thunder Fang:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Wild Charge:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Wild Charge:Catalytic Cure 1- Has a small chance of restoring the user’s HP when a move is successful.
Electric Terrain:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Make Some Sparks!:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Lithe- Prevents the Pokémon from getting paralyzed.
Critical Focus 1- Raises the Pokémon’s critical-hit rate when it lands a critical hit.
First Aid 4- Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.
Superduper Effective 1- Powers up moves that are super effective.
Paralysis Synergy 2- Powers up moves when the target is paralyzed.
Harry 3- Powers up moves when the target is flinching.
Standfast 5- Reduces recoil damage received from using moves that have recoil in the effect tag.
Turbo Charge 2- Quickly charges the move gauge when the field is Electric Terrain.
Power Induction 3- Powers up moves when the field is Electric Terrain.
Electrorepulsion 3- Reduces damage when the Pokémon is hit by an attack move when the field is Electric Terrain.
Shock Recovery 1- Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action when the field is Electric Terrain.
